title: New: Drop/Dead – Never Runs Out
body:
This beast is fresh outta the bag.

I must say, I fucking hate trumpet or saxophone solos sometimes (unless they’re used by **Guido**), but the horn here works so undeniably well. The catchy garage rhythm balances out the smoky jazz bar cheese, brought together by an ominously deep synth line. This is as cool as you can get. Up-and-comer **Drop/Dead** is pulling a lot of stops out of the bag – his recent remix of Brooklynite **Kuhn** was one of the best remixes I’ve heard in recent months. This guy is really one to watch. Let’s hope someone picks some of his stuff up, it’s gagging to be put out there.

_Listen to Never Runs Out below._
